titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty no certain sector mold press machines.
A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty no certain sector mold press machines.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description for certain sector mold press machines; and (2) extend the temporary suspension of duty on such machines.
